snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon said Thursday that he had appointed Nickolay E. Mladenov, a Bulgarian diplomat and statesman who has been his special representative in Iraq, as his new special Middle East peace envoy.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon said Thursday that he had appointed Nickolay E. Mladenov, a Bulgarian diplomat and statesman who has been his special representative in Iraq, as his new special Middle East peace envoy.

headline.main: New Middle East Envoy Is Appointed
headline.print_headline: New Middle East Envoy Is Appointed
